name: The Butler's Demise
description: Mr. Blackwood's body was found in the library. No sign of forced entry.
details:
The Butler's Demise (2023)

Mr. Blackwood was found lifeless in his library. No signs of forced entry were detected, suggesting the killer was already inside. Traces of poison were later found in a wine glass.

name: The Phantom Cargo
description: A crate of counterfeit goods was opened; the night watchman was knocked out.
details:
The Phantom Cargo (2023)

At the Port of Dover, Warehouse 4 was breached. A heavy crate containing counterfeit goods was opened and the night watchman was knocked unconscious. It appears to be an organized smuggling operation gone wrong.

name: Data Leak
description: Prototype X-99 disappeared from the secure vault during lunch break.
details:
Data Leak (2023)

Chaos at BioTech Future Labs. The top-secret Prototype X-99 vanished from the secure vault during the lunch break. Security logs indicate an insider threat familiar with the server room layout.

name: The Bearded Mona Lisa
description: A priceless painting was tagged with red spray paint.
details:
The Bearded Mona Lisa (2023)

A priceless painting at the City Museum of Fine Arts was defaced with bright red spray paint. The act seems less like a theft and more like a statement of artistic rebellion.

name: Purse Snatching
description: Theft near the fountain reported by a tourist.
details:
Purse Snatching (2023)

A tourist was robbed near the crowded fountain in Central Park. The thief vanished into the throng, leaving the victim in shock. Surveillance cameras caught a glimpse of a red cap.

name: Subway Assault
details:
Subway Assault (2023)

An altercation turned violent on Platform 3 of the Downtown Metro. A knife was pulled, and the aggressor was seen jumping over the turnstiles to escape. The motive appears to be personal.

name: Register Robbery
description: The cash register was forced open before opening hours.
details:
Register Robbery (2023)

The cash register at 'The Golden Crust' bakery was forced open before dawn. Curiously, the front door was unlocked, pointing towards someone who might still have a key.

name: Vehicle Vandalism
description: Several side mirrors were smashed during the game.
details:
Vehicle Vandalism (2023)

During a high-stakes match, several luxury vehicles were vandalized in the Stadium Parking. Smashed mirrors and dents suggest hooliganism fueled by post-game adrenaline.

name: Street Deal
description: Suspicious exchange reported by a local resident.
details:
Street Deal (2023)

Residents near Whispering Alley reported a suspicious exchange late at night. Police found traces of white powder and an overturned trash can, signs of a drug deal interrupted.

name: Bar Brawl
description: Fight broke out after a refusal of service.
details:
Bar Brawl (2023)

A refusal of service at 'The Last Drop' escalated into a massive brawl. Chairs were thrown and glasses smashed. The instigator seems to be a regular who couldn't handle their drink.

name: Operation Red Fox
description: A double agent was found poisoned in the back booth during a jazz concert.
details:
Operation Red Fox (1980)

Berlin, Cold War. A double agent was found poisoned in a back booth at Checkpoint Charlie Caf√©. The killer managed to slip a lethal dose into his drink unnoticed by the jazz-loving crowd.

name: The Silicon Soul
description: Lead developer found with their brain-computer interface overloaded by a virus.
details:
The Silicon Soul (2050)

A lead developer was found dead, their brain-interface overloaded by a combat virus. Digital forensics point to a rogue android unit breaching the server room.

name: Breathless in Sector 7
description: Sabotage of the main oxygen tank. Critical life support failure imminent.
details:
Breathless in Sector 7 (2146)

Mars Bio-Dome. A critical sabotage of the main oxygen tank threatens the colony. Surveillance footage captured a figure using a laser cutter to tamper with the life-support valves.
